message.name: AM_VP_TARG_POSE
message.description: This AutoModatility Vision Processor message encodes the translation and rotation vectors of the target pose.
message.field: The translation on the x axis in meters.
The translation on the y axis in meters.
The translation on the z axis in meters.
The rotation around the x axis in radians.
The rotation around the y axis in radians.
The rotation around the z axis in radians.
